author: Simon Difford
description: Rum and pineapple strike up a tropical harmony, helped by coconut, passionfruit and orange.
name: Caribbean Colada
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
30 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice
